channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - bytecode

item.title: Hacking java bytecode with dhex
item.description: I found myself in a weird situation: a long long time ago, I wrote a java application that I didn't touch nor ran for a few years. Today, I found it on a backup and wanted to run it again (its a graphical application for generating HTML pages). However, it â€¦
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
